Package com.eventmaster.backend.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.eventmaster.backend.controller.UserController
@RestController @CrossOrigin @RequestMapping("/user") public class UserController extends Object
A class which handles the HTTP-requests for user functions.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Fabian Eilber
